entry.source: Because of the demon Pluto, Tokyo is filled{F801}with poison, and we're running out of medical{F801}supplies. If you have {F804,5}{F878,1}{F804,0} {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0}s and{F801}{F804,5}{F878,2}{F804,0} {F804,5}{F872,2}{F804,0}s, can you give them to us?{F801}Please, there are many people in great need{F801}of this medicine.{F801}
